mapper.sql: sys_user_order.id as id, sys_user_order.user_id,uuid, sys_user_order.payment_type, sys_user_order.pay_card, sys_user_order.pay_name, sys_user_order.data_strorage, sys_user_order.sub_scription, sys_user_order.create_time, sys_user_order.update_time, sys_user_order.`status`
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user_order where user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_order (user_id, payment_type, pay_card, pay_name, data_strorage, sub_scription, create_time, update_time, `status`) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStrorage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subScription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})
